name: Donkey Kong Country 3: Dixie Kong's Double Trouble!
description:
Third time’s the charm in Kong Country!

Join the adventure with fearless heroine Dixie Kong and powerhouse toddler Kiddy Kong as they roar off into the wilds of the Northern Kremisphere! The hunt is on for the missing duo of Donkey Kong and Diddy Kong, even as the Kremlings join ranks under the command of their mysterious new leader, KAOS…

* Nine huge areas to be explored, including the all-new world, Pacifica.
* Use Dixie’s famous Helicopter Spin and Kiddy’s amazing strength to blaze a trail through the Krew.
* Dozens of secrets to discover – free the Banana Birds, reach the hidden areas, even journey to the Lost World of Krematoa!
